moves.1. d4: Hello everybody! I liked that game a lot so i decided to annotate it! Please feel free to comment and rate! I started with d4.
moves.1... d5: He played d5, good move though i would played Nf6.
moves.3. Nf3: So far it's good for both.
moves.3... b5: b5 i think is quite risky and holds him back in development.....
moves.4... c6: c6? i think is quite worthless move. e6 or Nf6 would be better i guess...
moves.5. e3: i was wondering between e3 and e4 but i played e3.
moves.6. Nc3: I wanted to develop all my pieces...
moves.6... a6: a6 is bad i think....The king's side is still unorganized...
moves.7. axb5: i decided to take the pawn...
moves.7... cxb5: He took it too...I'm a pawn down but i'm doing better in development...
moves.8. Be2: i wanted to rooke so i opened the bishop..
moves.8... Bxf3 9. Bxf3: We exchanged the pieces...Now his rook is in danger!
moves.9... Ra7: So he moved it....His pieces and generally his defence is disorganized and he's back in development...
moves.10... f6: f6? Another bad move....He's blocking his knight and opens the white line too...
moves.11. d5: I think d5 was the best move to do...
moves.12. e4: But i'm playing e4 to protect the pawn...
moves.12... e5: e5 was good i think but his king's side is still bad...
moves.13. Bg4: i wanted to threat his rook and open my bishop generally....
moves.13... Rc7: he moved it on that square, but i believe is bad placed...
moves.14. Be3: i opened the black bishop and had a plan to moved it in the c6 square...What do you think?
moves.14... Bc5: He saw that threat so he decided to exchange them...
moves.15. Bxc5 Rxc5: And i accepted that...Now the plan is to attack somehow to his king...
moves.17. Bf5: Now the plan to move after that the queen in the h5 square...
moves.17... g6: But he played g6 so i have to move it back...
moves.18. Bg4 h5: h5 is not helping very much i think....
moves.19. Be6: This is a good place gor my bishop!
moves.19... Ne7: Now is not help to develop the knight....
moves.20. Qf3: The will have to attack to his king's side...
moves.20... Rf8: In order to protect f6 pawn...
moves.21. Rad1: I have to move forward the d-pawn so it needs protection!
moves.21... Ra7: He moved there because if he didn't it would then come d6!
moves.22. Qg3: I will try to attack to the g6 pawn but i have to push his knight firstly!
moves.23. d6: d6! A nice move....he have to move the knight or let the pawn take it!
moves.23... Nc6: So he moved it ignoring the checkmate that's coming...
moves.25. Qxf7#: And i won the game..... I like that game cause it was a little bit different from others....Please comment and rate! Hope you liked it!
